org.opensaml.messaging.encoder.httpclient

Interface HttpClientRequestMessageEncoder<MessageType>

  • Type Parameters:
    MessageType - the message type of the message context on which to operate
    All Superinterfaces:
    Component, DestructableComponent, InitializableComponent, MessageEncoder<MessageType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHttpClientRequestMessageEncoder, BaseHttpClientRequestXMLMessageEncoder

    public interface HttpClientRequestMessageEncoder<MessageType>
extends MessageEncoder<MessageType>
    A specialization of MessageEncoder that operates on a sink message data type of HttpRequest.
